name: BackOffice
description: End to End test for Probate Back Office

scripts.dev-scripts-comment: Developer scripts for running/debugging a single test locally are specified below.
scripts.test-e2e-caveat: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/caseworker/caveatPath.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-caveat2: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/caseworker/caveatPath2.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-caveat3: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/caseworker/caveatPath3.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-caveat4: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/caseworker/caveatPath4.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-grantOfProbate: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/caseworker/grantOfProbatePath.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-willLodgement: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/caseworker/willLodgementPath.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.solicitor-tests-comment: If you wish to run solicitor tests in XUI locally, use these scripts below which set the appropriate env vars. Note - you may need to restart XUI docker container from time to time, seems flaky
scripts.test-e2e-sol-applyCaveat: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=false TEST_E2E_URL='http://localhost:3455' TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/solicitor/applyCaveat.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-sol-grantOfProbate: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=false TEST_E2E_URL='http://localhost:3455' TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/solicitor/applyGrantOfProbateSingleExecutor.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-sol-grantOfProbateMulti: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=false TEST_E2E_URL='http://localhost:3455' TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/solicitor/applyGrantOfProbateMultiExecutor.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-sol-grantOfProbateNoWill: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=false TEST_E2E_URL='http://localhost:3455' TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/solicitor/applyGrantOfProbateNoWill.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-sol-grantOfProbateWillAnnexed: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=false TEST_E2E_URL='http://localhost:3455' TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/solicitor/applyGrantOfProbateWillLeftAnnexed.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-sol-grantOfProbateWillAnnexedFa: NODE_PATH=. E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=false TEST_E2E_URL='http://localhost:3455' TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run paths/solicitor/applyGrantOfProbateWillLeftAnnexedFailure.js -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps
scripts.test-e2e-caseProgressStopEscalateIssue: E2E_TEST_PATH=./paths/caseprogress/caseProgressStopEscalateIssuePath.js TESTS_FOR_XUI_SERVICE=true E2E_TEST_TIME_TO_WAIT_FOR_TEXT=10 E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=true BO_E2E_TEST_ACTION_WAIT_TIME=10 NODE_PATH=. node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run-multiple parallel -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test-e2e-caseProgressStandard: E2E_TEST_PATH=./paths/caseprogress/caseProgressStandardPath.js E2E_TEST_TIME_TO_WAIT_FOR_TEXT=0 E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=false BO_E2E_TEST_ACTION_WAIT_TIME=0 NODE_PATH=. node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run-multiple parallel -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test-e2e-caseProgressReenterDeceasedDeta: E2E_TEST_PATH=./paths/caseprogress/caseProgressReenterDeceasedDetailsPath.js E2E_TEST_TIME_TO_WAIT_FOR_TEXT=0 E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=false BO_E2E_TEST_ACTION_WAIT_TIME=0 NODE_PATH=. node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run-multiple parallel -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test-e2e-caseProgressAppStopped: E2E_TEST_PATH=./paths/caseprogress/caseProgressApplicationStoppedPath.js E2E_TEST_TIME_TO_WAIT_FOR_TEXT=0 E2E_AUTO_DELAY_ENABLED=false BO_E2E_TEST_ACTION_WAIT_TIME=0 NODE_PATH=. node ./node_modules/codeceptjs/bin/codecept.js run-multiple parallel -c ./src/test/end-to-end/ --steps --reporter mochawesome
